comment:
* A replacer that calls a transliterator to generate its output text.
 * The input text to the transliterator is the output of another
 * UnicodeReplacer object.  That is, this replacer wraps another
 * replacer with a transliterator.
 * @author Alan Liu

variables.name: translit
variables.comment: * The transliterator.  Must not be null.

variables.name: replacer
variables.comment:
* The replacer object.  This generates text that is then
     * processed by 'translit'.  Must not be null.

methods.name: public int replace(Replaceable text, int start, int limit, int[] cursor)
public void addReplacementSetTo(UnicodeSet toUnionTo)
methods.comment:
* Union the set of all characters that may output by this object
     * into the given set.
     * @param toUnionTo the set into which to union the output characters

methodNames: public int replace(Replaceable text, int start, int limit, int[] cursor)
